{% trans 'Cache Admin Overview' %}

{% blocktrans %} The Cache Admin provides a web interface for inspecting and managing your Django cache instances. It allows you to browse cache keys, view their values, and perform operations like adding, editing, and deleting cache entries. {% endblocktrans %}

{% trans 'Support Levels' %}

{% trans 'Different cache backends have different levels of support in the Cache Admin:' %}

{% trans 'Badge' %} {% trans 'Description' %}
cachex {% trans 'Full support - django-cachex backends with full access to all features including key listing, pattern search, TTL inspection, and all data type operations.' %}
wrapped {% trans 'Wrapped support - Django builtin backends (LocMemCache, DatabaseCache, etc.) and django-redis. Most features available through wrapper compatibility.' %}
limited {% trans 'Limited support - Custom or unknown cache backends. Basic operations may work but key listing and advanced features may not be available.' %}
